mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( code, title, author, publisher, isbn, category, publish_date, price, entry_date, total_quantity, stock_quantity, borrow_times ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{isbn}, #{category}, #{publishDate}, #{price}, #{entryDate}, #{totalQuantity}, #{stockQuantity}, #{borrowTimes} )
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET title = #{title}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, isbn = #{isbn}, category = #{category}, publish_date = #{publishDate}, price = #{price}, entry_date = #{entryDate}, total_quantity = #{totalQuantity}, stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity}, borrow_times = #{borrowTimes} WHERE id = #{id}
